title: Privacy Center | TechSmith Privacy Center
content:

TechSmith and GDPR

Data Subject Requests

A Data Subject Request allows users to obtain information that helps them understand how and why their data is being used. We make it easy to submit a request and will be in touch soon after we receive your inquiry. 

Submit a Request

Adjust Cookie Settings

Our website uses cookies to deliver the best experience to our users. If you'd like to adjust the cookies used as you browse, click the link below.

Adjust My Email Preferences

Need to change subscribe or unsuscribe from any of our email lists? Follow the link below to change settings in your TechSmith Account.

Adjust My Email Preferences

TechSmith Sub-Processor List

TechSmith uses certain third-party sub-processors to support the delivery of its software and services.

View Sub-Processors

Third Party Services and Links
